document.heading: PUEBLO DE SAN ILDEFONSO COUNCIL RESOLUTION NO. SI-R22-003
Accounting Policies and Procedures Manual Amendments of 2022
document.preamble: At a duly called meeting of the Council of San Ildefonso Pueblo on the 5th day of May, 2022, the following law was adopted:

recital.text: the Council has enacted a 75-page, comprehensive Accounting Policy and Procedures Manual ("Manual") to govern the financial practices of the Pueblo; and,

the Finance Department and Governor have identified the need to amend the Manual to streamline certain accounting procedures and to clarify several accounting practices to bring greater efficiencies and cost-savings to the Pueblo; and,

the Finance Department, Tribal Administrator, and Governor have developed a set of proposed amendments to the Manual and have presented the proposed amendments to the Council for consideration and approval.
that the Council hereby enacts the attached law entitled "ACCOUNTING POLICY AND PROCEDURES MANUAL AMENDMENTS OF 2022."

procedural-data.text: The foregoing resolution was duly voted upon by the Council on May 5, 2022, at a meeting with a vote of 10 in favor, 0 opposed, 0 abstaining and 0 absent (Governor presiding and not voting) pursuant to the authority vested in the Council by the Agreement of the Pueblo de San Ildefonso.

text.strong: DELIVERY OF THE RESOLUTION TO THE GOVERNOR:

procedural-data.text: Resolution No. SI-R22-003 was presented to the Governor of the Pueblo de San Ildefonso on the 5th day of May, 2022, pursuant to the Governing document of the Pueblo de San Ildefonso ("Agreement"), GOVERNOR, Sec. 4(c), and will become effective after signature by the Governor or veto override by the Council.

attachment.heading: ACCOUNTING POLICY AND PROCEDURES MANUAL AMENDMENTS OF 2022

section.heading: Short Title
section.text: This enactment shall be known as the "ACCOUNTING POLICY AND PROCEDURES MANUAL AMENDMENTS OF 2022."

section.heading: Purpose
section.text: The purpose of this Act is to approve amendments of the Accounting Policy and Procedures Manual.

section.heading: Findings
section.text: The Council hereby finds and declares that:

para.text: The Council has enacted a 75-page, comprehensive Accounting Policy and Procedures Manual ("Manual") to govern the financial practices of the Pueblo.

The Finance Department and Governor have identified the need to amend the Manual to streamline certain accounting procedures and to clarify several accounting practices to bring greater efficiencies and cost-savings to the Pueblo.

The Finance Department, Tribal Administrator, and Governor have developed a set of proposed amendments to the Manual and have presented the proposed amendments to the Council for consideration and approval.

section.heading: Approval
section.text: The Council hereby approves and enacts the attached Accounting Policy and Procedures Manual amendments of 2022.
